page.title: 11THE VILLAGE HALL, EDGEFIELD
page.content: The village hall is very important in Edgefield's social life. It is well situated on the edge of the village green and on the main Holt-Norwich road. The hall committee whose main object is to raise money for the extension and upkeep of the hall (Â£4000 raised from this small community in two years) also organises annual events such as a summer fete, a harvest supper, and a Christmas party for the over 60s. The Tuesday club with about 30 members organises events throughout the year. Church members provide a branch ofthe Mothers' Union and a Sunday School on Tuesdays in termtime. There is Bingo every Thursday, and a Youth Club.
